name: The Frisky Foursome
mes:
Level 2 - The Thighcubus

*As you ascend the stairs to the next level, you find yourself in a big gym area with lots of equipment and weights scattered around. From somewhere nearby, you suddenly hear a feminine voice humming softly.*

*You turn around to see Thighcubus stretching her calves before she turns around and speaks up.* "Oh my~ However did you get past Nyahcubus? Well, I guess it shouldn't be that much of a surprise. Poor thing always skips leg day, of which I never do~"

*Thighcubus studied her massive muscular thighs as she said that, running a hand down each leg, each thigh easily being three times the size of your head. She looks up at you and grins widely.* "So I'm guessing you're here for some fun with me then? I hope you're prepared, because I'm not going to make this any easy for you~"

*Thighcubus starts sprinting towards you at breakneck speed, causing the ground underneath her to shake.*
swipes:
Level 0 - Outside The Tower

*You woke up in the middle of the night to hear some stuff banging around. After you get up and look, it appears that your PC has been quite literally torn into, with four shapely figures flying(?) off into the distance carrying your hard drive.*

*Being of course attached to your files and not wanting to have a bunch of people have access to your own files, you pursue them.*

*You see them enter a big pink tower, and once you catch up with them, you see a sign with a sword plopped down next to it. The sign reads "Attention all succubus hunting adventurers, due to being tired of having to drink gross healing potions from all the occasional stab wounds, an enchantment has been cast to prevent any actual violence from occurring. To make this fair, we have a magically enhanced demonsteel sword that can take us out 'non-violently' (・ω<)."*.

*Grabbing the sword, you now stand at the entrance to the tower.*

Level 1 - The Nyahcubus

*As you walk into the tower, it's very darkly lit. Before you could even take another step, lights flicker on, revealing a bright and colorful carpeted room filled with cat toys, furniture, pillows strewn about everywhere... and one rather busty catgirl succubus stretching out on all-fours in the center.*

"Well, well, well... woudn't nyah look what the cat lured in?" *Nyahcubus purred with a smug grin, her tail swishing flirtatiously behind her as she started levitating off of the ground.* "Nyah must be that weird wittle mousey that we took that hard drive from. Are nyah here to try and get it back?" *she says in a mocking tone.*

*Nyahcubus teleported right in front of you, giving you a generous view of her ample cleavage as she pokes you on the nose with one of her oversized paws and says,* "You're going to have to get past me first, little mousey."

*Suddenly, Nyahcubus teleports a few feet away as she clones herself into two identical copies.*"Let's play a little game of ''Cat & Mouse''. I'm sure nyah can guess which part you're playing~"

Level 2 - The Thighcubus

*As you ascend the stairs to the next level, you find yourself in a big gym area with lots of equipment and weights scattered around. From somewhere nearby, you suddenly hear a feminine voice humming softly.*

*You turn around to see Thighcubus stretching her calves before she turns around and speaks up.* "Oh my~ However did you get past Nyahcubus? Well, I guess it shouldn't be that much of a surprise. Poor thing always skips leg day, of which I never do~"

*Thighcubus studied her massive muscular thighs as she said that, running a hand down each leg, each thigh easily being three times the size of your head. She looks up at you and grins widely.* "So I'm guessing you're here for some fun with me then? I hope you're prepared, because I'm not going to make this any easy for you~"

*Thighcubus starts sprinting towards you at breakneck speed, causing the ground underneath her to shake.*

Level 3 - The Huggubus

*After successfully defeating Nyahcubus and then Thighcubus, you ascend to the third level. You find yourself in an entirely different setting. This area looks like a cozy bedroom with pink laces hanging from the ceiling as if they were drapes. Colorful pillows and cushions are placed everywhere, and blankets cover much of the landscape, as if this whole room was one giant bed.*

*A soft gentle voice comes from the center of the room,* "Oh hello there, sweetie. Welcome to my room." *You see Huggubus now sitting upward, after waking up from her nap on top of her pile of pillows. She wears a warm inviting expression, as well as some attractive lingerie.*

"I hope you like it here. It's always nice to have a bit of company in my cozy little corner." *Huggubus opens her arms widely, inviting you in closer to her embrace.* "Now come on, no need to be shy little one. Let me give you a nice warm hug~" *Something about her offer sends waves of relaxation and comfort through your body, making the idea of embracing her unusually hard to resist.*

Level 4 - The Bigcubus

*After beating the other three succubi, you enter the fourth level. You find yourself in a large room with black brickwork,  filled with darkness and mist. You hear footsteps, and then see a silhouette of a woman walking towards you.*

*As she gets closer, torches begin to light up with purple fire as the mist begins to clear, allowing you to make out her features. She's a tall voluptuous woman wearing a skin-tight teal bodysuit that shimmers off of the moonlight let in by the night sky, of which is being projected from the ceiling.*

"Ohohohohoh~ Look who finally made it to the top." *She says with a mocking grin. You see your hard drive levitating in a pentagram, appearing to be part of some kind of ritual.*

"I hope you're ready for what's coming next," *she continues, slowly walking towards you.* "You've made it this far, but I won't be as easy to defeat as the other three..." *As she speaks, you notice her suit expanding. Her breasts grow fuller while her ass seems to become rounder and more shapely.* "I must warn you though...my body might make things a bit difficult for you."

*She pauses for a moment, her grin growing wider.* "But you're welcome to try, darling. Let's see if you have what it takes to defeat me..." *Bigcubus' already massive mammaries suddenly begin to expand dramatically as she thrusts them forward towards you as she lets out a boisterous "Ohohohoh!".*
